questions.question_text: A system administrator adds two vNICs to an existing service profile that is used to run a vSphere environment to support disjoint Layer 2 network connectivity. However, after the server is rebooted, the host is not accessible on the network. Which action resolves the issue?

choices.B: Remove all existing vNICs and add them in the desired order.
choices.A: Build a new service profile with the desired network configuration.
choices.D: Add the disjoint Layer 2 VLANs to an existing vNIC rather than adding new vNICs.
choices.C: Create a vNIC placement policy to avoid adapter renumbering.

questions.question_text: A network engineer is implementing the Cisco ACI Fabric and notices that the Leaf-1 switch is registered, has an assigned name, but is displayed as inactive in the APIC. After further investigation, it became clear that the leaf switch was recently moved from another Cisco ACI environment. Which action resolves the problem?

choices.C: Change the clock offset from low to high between apic 1 and Leaf-1
choices.D: Modify the ISIS interface peering IP address between apic 1 and Leaf-1
choices.B: Define the new TEP address for Leaf-1

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Correct is A

Selected Answer: A
The leaf should be cleaned completely before reused in another Fabric

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. An engineer fails to implement a Cisco UCS Manager integration manager. The credentials and IP connectivity between Cisco APIC and UCS Manager are configured as expected. Which action resolves the issue?

choices.B: Enable JSON API on the Cisco UCS Manager
choices.A: Disable HTTP to HTTPS redirection in Cisco UCS Manager
choices.C: Change the Integration Manager name to FQDN of the Cisco UCS Manager
choices.D: Install ExternalSwitch app in the APIC controller

discussion.content: This error means that image is either wrong or corrupted, so answer seem to be correct

choices.C: Boot the kickstart image from boot flash and load the system image
choices.B: Reset the I/O module and install the firmware image from the boot flash
choices.A: Remove the service pack and upgrade through the auto-install procedure
choices.D: Reload the switch and boot the kickstart image from the TFTP server

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A network engineer upgrades the firmware of a Cisco Fabric Interconnect from boot flash. During the process, the fabric interconnect reboots and displays the message shown in the exhibit. Which action resolves the issue?

//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A Cisco UCS B-Series Blade Server is configured to boot from a shared storage via an iSCSI network. When a service profile is associated with the blade, the blade fails to attach the LUN. Which action resolves the issue?

choices.B: Register the blade as an initiator on the storage array
choices.D: Establish a Layer 2 connection between the blade and the storage
choices.C: Implement a Layer 3 connection between the blade and the storage
choices.A: Place VLAN 0 on the interface that connects to the storage

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Correct is B

It is not B ? 
If ping is successful, but the target state is not valid, check the LUN masking configuration and host registration on the storage controller.


https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/servers-unified-computing/ucs-manager/116003-iscsi-ucs-config-00.html
